name: 马特·韦斯

last_movies.title: 杰西卡·琼斯 第三季

introduction: Matt grew up in Pasadena, CA. He attended the L.A. County High School for the ARTS. Meanwhile, he spent time at the Magic Castle, Hollywood, with his magician father (aka - Mr. Magic). The remainder of his adolescence was spent rock climbing, river rafting and hanging out with skydivers and base jumpers. Matt attended Ringling Bros. Barnum & Bailey's Clown College under the guidance of his uncle, Jon Weiss, who's known for being shot out a cannon with Ringling and The Amazing Race (2001). Matt graduated from Stephens College for Women, as one of twelve male apprentices. He is a founding member of The Living Room Theatre and Fishtank Performance Studio in Kansas City, MO. He now resides in NY where he continues to act, write and direct.
